docs.title: 歡迎來到陽明交大資訊技術服務中心 DocHub
docs.text: 這是陽明交通大學資訊技術服務中心的文件中心，提供各種服務指南、技術文件與常見問題解答。

docs.text:
如有任何問題或建議，歡迎透過以下方式聯絡我們：

docs.title: 網站無障礙聲明
docs.text: 本網站依據「無障礙網頁開發規範」（Web Content Accessibility Guidelines, WCAG 2.1）等級 AA 標準進行設計與開發，以確保所有使用者都能平等地獲取資訊。

docs.title: 1. 鍵盤導航支援
docs.text:
本網站完全支援鍵盤操作，您可以使用以下快速鍵：

  • Tab 鍵：移動到下一個可操作元素
  • Shift + Tab：移動到上一個可操作元素
  • Enter 鍵：選擇或啟動目前的元素
  • 空白鍵：捲動頁面或勾選核取方塊
  • 方向鍵：在選單或清單中移動

docs.title: 2. 跳過區塊
docs.text: 網頁提供「跳至主要內容」連結，讓使用鍵盤或螢幕閱讀器的使用者能快速跳過導航區域，直接進入主要內容。

docs.title: 3. 替代文字
docs.text: 所有圖片、圖示和多媒體內容都提供適當的替代文字描述，確保使用螢幕閱讀器的使用者能理解內容。

docs.title: 4. 標題結構
docs.text: 網頁使用適當的標題層級（H1 至 H6），建立清楚的內容階層，方便快速瀏覽與導航。

docs.title: 5. 色彩對比
docs.text: 文字與背景的對比度符合 WCAG 2.1 AA 標準： - 一般文字：至少 4.5:1 - 大型文字：至少 3:1 - 圖形元素：至少 3:1

docs.title: 6. 深色模式
docs.text: 提供深色模式切換功能，讓使用者依個人需求選擇舒適的閱讀模式。

docs.title: 7. 文字縮放
docs.text: 網站使用相對單位設計，支援瀏覽器的文字縮放功能（最高至 200%），不會影響版面配置或功能。

docs.title: 8. 表單標籤
docs.text: 所有表單欄位都有明確的標籤說明，並在必要時提供額外的輔助說明。

docs.title: 9. 錯誤訊息
docs.text: 表單驗證錯誤會提供清楚的錯誤訊息，說明錯誤原因與修正方法。

docs.title: 10. 語言標示
docs.text: 網頁正確標示主要語言（繁體中文或英文），並支援多國語言切換。

docs.title: 螢幕閱讀器相容性
docs.text:
本網站經過以下螢幕閱讀器測試：

  • NVDA（Windows）
  • JAWS（Windows）
  • VoiceOver（macOS/iOS）
  • TalkBack（Android）

docs.title: 減少動畫
docs.text: 本網站遵循使用者的系統偏好設定，當偵測到「減少動畫」設定時，會自動減少或停用動畫效果。

docs.title: 鍵盤焦點指示
docs.text: 所有可互動元素在獲得鍵盤焦點時，都會顯示清楚的視覺指示，確保使用者知道目前所在位置。

docs.title: 無障礙問題回報
docs.text:
如果您在使用本網站時遇到任何無障礙相關問題，或有改善建議，歡迎與我們聯繫：

  • 電子郵件：support@it.nycu.edu.tw
  • 電話：(03) 571-2121

我們將盡快處理您的回報並持續改善網站的無障礙性。

docs.title: HPC 高速運算平台服務說明
服務說明
docs.text:
• 為推動校內各研究團隊使用資訊中心建置之 HPC 高速運算平台，建立安全且可信賴之運算服務，協助研究團隊進行 AI 與高效能運算相關研究。
  • 平台目前有 5 座 Nvidia DGX 伺服器：兩座配備 8 片 H100 GPU，三座配備 8 片 H200 GPU。
  • 提供獨佔式及佇列式 GPU 服務，滿足不同研究需求與排程模式。

docs.title: 平台規格
docs.text:
GPU 型號 類型 GPU 核心數 圖形記憶體 H100 整張 80GB H200 整張 7 144GB H200 MIG-1g.18gb 1 18GB H200 MIG-2g.35gb 2 35GB
  • 加值服務：HPC 儲存裝置提供 1 TB 免費空間；超過 1 TB 後，每 GB 收費 2 元。

docs.title: 服務對象
docs.text: • 校內編制內之教師與研究員皆可申請；有關其他身分或合作案之使用方式請洽資訊中心或依公告規定辦理。

docs.title: 申請方式與費用
docs.text:
• 申請請參考資訊中心之收費標準頁面。
  • 新申請請至 HPC 申請系統（https://hpcreg.nycu.edu.tw/）使用「HPC 新申請」功能提交。開通通常於 3 個工作天內完成（若主持人未簽核，仍會先暫時開通），主持人需在 7 個工作天內完成簽核，否則帳號可能停用並計入費用。
  • 獨佔式 GPU 服務以天為單位申請，最少以 7 天為單位申請；可一次申請多個單位。

docs.title: 計費與使用規範重點
docs.text:
• GPU 使用皆為先使用後付費，系統每月寄送繳費通知單，請於當月底前完成繳費；逾期一周若仍未繳費將停止帳號登入，一個月後可能刪除帳號與資料。
  • 佇列式服務有最低資源使用量規定（例如每月最低 GPU 小時數，系統會每月結算並依不到門檻採取後續處理），請留意官方公告。
  • 使用者須遵守校內資安與智慧財產權相關規定；若發生重大資安事件或規範違反，中心得暫停該帳號服務。 平台不負責使用者資料備份，使用者需自行備份重要資料。

docs.title: 使用注意事項
docs.text:
• 帳號存取受 IP 限制，依資安規範每個帳號可設定兩組可存取 IP。
  • 為鼓勵研究團隊，首次申請第一個月可享有免費使用優惠（以資訊中心最新公告為準）。
  • H100 型每個工作（job）最長 TimeLimit 為 7 天；H200 型每個工作最長為 2 天。
  • 提交工作前請先確認腳本與資源設定（CPU、Memory、GPU、TimeLimit）正確，以免工作被排程或被取消且資源仍被計費。

docs.title: Website Accessibility Statement
docs.text: This website is designed and developed in accordance with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA to ensure equal access to information for all users.

docs.title: 1. Keyboard Navigation Support
docs.text:
This website fully supports keyboard operation. You can use the following shortcuts:

  • Tab: Move to the next interactive element
  • Shift + Tab: Move to the previous interactive element
  • Enter: Select or activate the current element
  • Space: Scroll the page or check checkboxes
  • Arrow Keys: Navigate through menus or lists

docs.title: 2. Skip Blocks
docs.text: The website provides a "Skip to Main Content" link, allowing keyboard and screen reader users to quickly bypass navigation areas and go directly to the main content.

docs.title: 3. Alternative Text
docs.text: All images, icons, and multimedia content include appropriate alternative text descriptions to ensure screen reader users can understand the content.

docs.title: 4. Heading Structure
docs.text: The website uses appropriate heading levels (H1 to H6) to create a clear content hierarchy for easy browsing and navigation.

docs.title: 5. Color Contrast
docs.text: Text and background contrast ratios meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards: - Normal text: At least 4.5:1 - Large text: At least 3:1 - Graphical elements: At least 3:1

docs.title: 6. Dark Mode
docs.text: A dark mode toggle is provided, allowing users to choose a comfortable reading mode based on their preferences.

docs.title: 7. Text Scaling
docs.text: The website uses relative units, supporting browser text scaling (up to 200%) without affecting layout or functionality.

docs.title: 8. Form Labels
docs.text: All form fields have clear labels and additional assistance when necessary.

docs.title: 9. Error Messages
docs.text: Form validation errors provide clear error messages explaining the issue and how to correct it.

docs.title: 10. Language Identification
docs.text: The website correctly identifies the primary language (Traditional Chinese or English) and supports multilingual switching.

docs.title: Screen Reader Compatibility
docs.text:
This website has been tested with the following screen readers:

  • NVDA (Windows)
  • JAWS (Windows)
  • VoiceOver (macOS/iOS)
  • TalkBack (Android)

docs.title: Reduced Motion
docs.text: The website respects user system preferences and automatically reduces or disables animations when "reduce motion" is detected.

docs.title: Keyboard Focus Indicators
docs.text: All interactive elements display clear visual indicators when they receive keyboard focus, ensuring users know their current position.

docs.title: Report Accessibility Issues
docs.text:
If you encounter any accessibility issues while using this website or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us:

  • Email: support@it.nycu.edu.tw
  • Phone: (03) 571-2121

We will address your report as soon as possible and continue to improve the website's accessibility.

Commitment

The IT Service Center of National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University is committed to ensuring the accessibility of digital content. We will continue to monitor and improve the website's accessibility features to provide equal access to information for all users.

docs.title: Service Overview
docs.text:
• To promote the use of the HPC high-performance computing platform provided by the IT Center among on-campus research teams, we provide a secure and reliable computing service to assist research groups in AI and high-performance computing related research.
  • The platform currently has 5 Nvidia DGX servers: two systems equipped with 8 H100 GPUs each, and three systems equipped with 8 H200 GPUs each.
  • We offer both exclusive (reserved) and queued (shared) GPU services to meet different research needs and scheduling modes.

docs.title: Platform Specifications
docs.text:
GPU Model Type Number of GPU Cores GPU Memory H100 whole GPU 80GB H200 whole GPU 7 144GB H200 MIG-1g.18gb 1 18GB H200 MIG-2g.35gb 2 35GB
  • Additional services: HPC storage provides 1 TB of free space; beyond 1 TB, the charge is NT$2 per GB.

docs.title: Eligible Users
docs.text: • Faculty and researchers officially appointed by the university may apply; for other affiliations or collaborative projects please contact the IT Center or follow the official announcements.

docs.title: How to Apply and Fees
docs.text:
• Please refer to the IT Center's charging standard page for application and fee details.
  • New applications should be submitted via the HPC application system (https://hpcreg.nycu.edu.tw/) using the "HPC New Application" feature. Activation is usually completed within 3 working days (accounts may be temporarily activated before the principal investigator's approval). The principal investigator must complete approval within 7 working days; otherwise the account may be suspended and charges may be applied.
  • Exclusive GPU service (reserved) is applied per day, with a minimum booking unit of 7 days; multiple units may be booked in one application.

docs.title: Billing and Key Usage Rules
docs.text:
• GPU usage is billed post-use. The system sends monthly payment notices; please complete payment by the end of the month. Accounts will be blocked from login if payment is overdue by one week, and accounts and data may be deleted after one month of non-payment.
  • Queued (shared) service has a minimum resource usage requirement (for example, a minimum number of GPU hours per month). The system settles monthly and will take follow-up actions if usage does not meet the threshold—please pay attention to official announcements.
  • Users must comply with campus information security and intellectual property regulations. In case of serious information security incidents or policy violations, the Center may suspend the account service.
  • The platform does not provide backup for user data; users are responsible for backing up important data themselves.

docs.title: Usage Notes
docs.text:
• Account access is restricted by IP. According to information security rules, each account may set two allowed IP ranges.
  • To encourage research teams, first-time applicants may enjoy a free usage promotional period for the first month (subject to the IT Center's latest announcements).
  • For H100, the maximum TimeLimit per job is 7 days; for H200, the maximum TimeLimit per job is 2 days.
  • Before submitting jobs, please confirm that your scripts and resource settings (CPU, Memory, GPU, TimeLimit) are correct to avoid jobs being scheduled or cancelled while resources continue to be billed.
